sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT MAX(DTStamp) AS MaxDate FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[cdp_customer_preferences_archive] WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT MAX(EmailChannelOptStatusDate) AS MaxDate FROM [Masterdata_CDP].[OptOut_archive] WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CDPCustomerPreferencesCount FROM EDME_DataFactory.cdp_customer_preferences_v2 with(nolock) where DTStamp is not null AND DTStamp>'@{activity('Cdp_Customer_Preferences_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'
SELECT COUNT(1) AS OptOutCount FROM EDME_DataFactory.OptOut with(nolock) where EmailChannelOptStatusDate>'@{activity('OptOut_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

value.value: No RAW Data Available For EDW_CDP_Customer_Prefrence_Count

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select globalId,
customerContact,
opt_in,
opt_in_type,
sourceSystem,
dtec,
contactType ,
DTStamp
from EDME_DataFactory.cdp_customer_preferences_v2 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE DTStamp is not null AND DTStamp >'@{activity('Cdp_Customer_Preferences_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

value.value: No RAW Data Available For EDW_OptOut_Count

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select CustomerKey,
EmailAddress,
EmailChannelOptOutFlag,
EmailChannelOptStatusDate,
DSG_Brand_Flag,
EAGR_Brand_Flag
from EDME_DataFactory.OptOut WITH(NOLOCK)
where EmailChannelOptStatusDate >'@{activity('OptOut_MaxDate').output.firstRow.MaxDate}'

select globalId,
customerContact,
opt_in,
opt_in_type,
sourceSystem,
dtec,
contactType 
from EDME_DataFactory.cdp_customer_preferences WITH(NOLOCK) where dtec<>'null.null'

select CustomerKey,
EmailAddress,
EmailChannelOptOutFlag,
EmailChannelOptStatusDate,
DSG_Brand_Flag,
EAGR_Brand_Flag
from EDME_DataFactory.OptOut WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT MAX(LasteTriggerDateTime) AS LasteTriggerDateTime FROM Audit.ADFRetailCustomerWatermark WITH(NOLOCK)

UPDATE Audit.ADFRetailCustomerWatermark SET LasteTriggerDateTime='@{formatDateTime(variables('ToDateTime'),'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}';
select 1 as success;

Source.value: Source is D365 ECM Customers Files
Source is Homes RET Customers Files

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT oslLocationID,
oslAccountNo,
oslShipTo,
oslLocationName,
oslAddress1,
oslAddress2,
oslCity,
oslState,
oslZip,
oslCountry,
oslCounty,
oslPrimaryPhone,
oslPrimaryFax,
oslPrimaryEmail,
oslLatitude,
oslLongitude,
oslLocationStatus,
oslLocationStatusNotes,
oslLegacyLocationID,
oslWhseShipTo,
oslProspectID,
oslOwnerType,
oslLta,
oslDMA,
oslMSA,
oslCountyFips,
oslMarketZone,
oslOpAreaZone,
oslCurrency,
oslLanguage,
oslTimeZone,
oslGeographicZone,
oslStatus,
oslStatusNotes,
oslLocationType,
oslSoftOpenDate,
oslGrandOpenDate,
oslClosed,
oslClosedDate,
oslClosedAuthorization,
oslRelocated,
oslRelocationCloseDate,
oslRelocationOpenDate,
oslRelocationNotes,
oslAcquisition,
oslAcquisitionDate,
oslAcquisitionNotes,
oslPreOpenComments,
oslTUAID,
oslTUADate,
oslTUAExpireDate,
oslTUATerm,
oslTUADateComplete,
oslTurnoverDate,
oslRecordChangesFlag,
oslOperationsIntroDate,
oslMsPipelineDate,
oslLicenseeID,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
dtec,
oslAddress3,
oslStoreRefresh,
oslStoreRefreshDate,
oslStoreRefreshNotes,
oslmPlansSubToDesign,
oslmPRMeeting,
oslmPlansSentToOwnerLic,
oslURLRegistration,
oslEnterpriseStoreNumber FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSLocation WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT osOneSourceID,
osOneSourceName,
osLegacyLocationID,
osLegacyStoreID,
osProfitCenter,
osChannel,
osActive,
osStoreType,
osSource,
osLocationID,
osStartDate,
osEndDate,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
dtec,
osProfitCenterType,
osProfitCenterStatus FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSOneSource WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT oslLicenseeID,
oslStoreType,
oslLicenseeNotes,
oslPrimaryCountry,
oslStatus,
oslActive,
oslActiveDate,
oslActiveNotes,
oslGuarantors,
oslMailingAddress1,
oslMailingAddress2,
oslMailingCity,
oslMailingState,
oslMailingZip,
oslMailingCountry,
oslLegalEntityName,
oslLegalEntityAddress1,
oslLegalEntityAddress2,
oslLegalEntityCity,
oslLegalEntityState,
oslLegalEntityZip,
oslLegalEntityCountry,
usra,
dtea,
usrc,
detc,
oslLicensedTerritory,
oslDisclosureDocument,
oslMailingAdd FROM [EDME_DataFactory].OSLicensee WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT [Status] AS Status,
[LocationKey] AS LocationKey,
[Prospect ID] AS ProspectID,
[Google ID] AS GoogleID,
[Bindy ID] AS BindyID,
[StoreID] AS StoreID,
[ProfitCenter] AS ProfitCenter,
[Location] AS Location,
[Country] AS Country,
[Account #] AS Account,
[Store Front Ship-To] AS StoreFrontShipTo,
[Entity] AS Entity,
[Licensee / Contact] AS LicenseeContact,
[Soft Open Date] AS SoftOpenDate,
[Acquisition Date] AS AcquisitionDate,
[Closure Date] AS ClosureDate,
[ShopperTrakLocID] AS ShopperTrakLocID,
[Store Address] AS StoreAddress,
[City] AS City,
[State / Province] AS StateProvince,
[ZIP] AS ZIP,
[DMA ID] AS DMAID,
[DMA Region] AS DMARegion,
[Showroom Sq. Ft.] AS ShowroomSqFt,
[Store Type] AS StoreType,
[Store Model] AS StoreModel,
[Store Version] AS StoreVersion,
[Market] AS Market,
[Region] AS Region,
[Building Ownership] AS BuildingOwnership,
[Country Category] AS CountryCategory,
[Domestic Category] AS DomesticCategory,
[Classification] AS Classification,
[Store Phone] AS StorePhone,
[District Manager] AS DistrictManager,
[BDDirector] AS BDDirector,
[Licensee Email] AS LicenseeEmail,
[Licensee Phone #] AS LicenseePhone,
[Corporation Address] AS CorporationAddress,
[Corp City] AS CorpCity,
[Corp State] AS CorpState,
[Corp Zip] AS CorpZip,
[RDC Address] AS RDCAddress,
[RDC City] AS RDCCity,
[RDC State] AS RDCState,
[RDC Zip] AS RDCZip,
[RDC Ship To] AS RDCShipTo,
[RDC Sq. Ft.] AS RDCSqFt,
[RDC Dock Doors] AS RDCDockDoors,
[TUA Expiration Date] AS TUAExpirationDate,
[Licensed Territory] AS LicensedTerritory,
[Latitude] AS Latitude,
[Longitude] AS Longitude,
[Notes] AS Notes,
[Store Email] AS StoreEmail,
[Unit #] AS Unit,
[OneSource ID] AS OneSourceID,
[HS Database Name] AS HSDatabaseName,
[SVP] AS SVP,
[VP] AS VP,
[Sr. RD] AS SrRD,
[RD] AS RD,
[Store Manager] AS StoreManager,
[Store Mgr. Phone] AS StoreMgrPhone,
[Sales Manager (1)] AS SalesManager1,
[Sales Manager (2)] AS SalesManager2,
[Sales Manager (3)] AS SalesManager3,
[Sales Manager (4)] AS SalesManager4,
[Office Manager] AS OfficeManager,
[Director of Ops] AS DirectorOfOps,
[Regional Ops Mgr] AS RegionalOpsMgr,
[Ops Mgr] AS OpsMgr,
[Comp Status] AS CompStatus,
[Kit #] AS Kit,
[Traffic Divisor] AS TrafficDivisor,
[ERP] AS ERP,
[DTC Technology] AS DTCTechnology,
[DTC Brand] AS DTCBrand,
[Forum ID] AS ForumID,
[Account Type] AS AccountType,
[Facade Current Image] AS FacadeCurrentImage,
[Website Facade Current] AS WebsiteFacadeCurrent
--,[Store Manager Image] AS StoreManagerImage
FROM EDME_DataFactory.StoreMasterCustom WITH(NOLOCK)
